description:
If you are a busy entrepreneur or professional, you've probably presented hundreds of proposals only to find out that someone who did and said all the right things got the job.

Learn how to turn every proposal into business by understanding how to build relationships and creating proposals that support the sales process. In this course you will learn a system where you don't have to close a sale, and the sales close themselves!

  • Learn how to build a proposal using infographics to persuade your evaluators
  • Understand how to quickly build a relationship sufficient to do business
  • Master the art of creating a proposal that removes any doubt that you are the right person or the right business for the job
  • Learn how to structure your meeting when you present your proposal
title: The Art Of Creating Killer Proposals & Closing Every Sale
